mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id, t.role_id AS roleId, t.menu_id AS menuId, t.create_time as createTime, t.create_id AS createId, t.last_update_time AS lastUpdateTime, t.last_update_id AS lastUpdateId, t.is_deleted AS isDeleted FROM zlogistics.role_menu t WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into zlogistics.role_menu( role_id, menu_id, create_time, create_id, last_update_time, last_update_id, is_deleted )values( #{roleId}, #{menuId}, now(), 0, now(), 0, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id, t.role_id AS roleId, t.menu_id AS menuId, t1.role_name AS roleName, t2.menu_name AS menuName, t.create_time AS createTime, t.create_id AS createId, t.last_update_time AS lastUpdateTime, t.last_update_id AS lastUpdateId, t.is_deleted AS isDeleted from zlogistics.role_menu t left join zlogistics.role t1 on t.role_id = t1.role_id left join zlogistics.menu t2 on t.menu_id = t2.menu_id where t.is_deleted = 0 and t.role_id = #{roleId}
